1111266654032486401.text: Credit Card Proliferation: For the past decade, #creditcards have proliferated across various spend categories and demographic groups - several issuers have leveraged the credit card as a co-marketing channel or offered category-specific #marketing incentives. #AppleEventpic.twitter.com/zKHZmue7GY

1106252857647484930.text: Mobile Wallet Landscape: The US #mobile #wallet landscape has continued to fragment as Big Tech and new merchant entrants (i.e., Kroger) have developed offerings to control the consumer experience -- fragmentation will continue as new, adjacent players may enter (#Venmo).pic.twitter.com/AVoKAcAnnx

1103707911249948673.text: Future Mobility Fleet Operators: As the #mobility ecosystem expands, advanced #vehicle technologies emerge, and modalities proliferate, future #fleet operators will fragment.
